item.description:
OK, this isn't hiking but it is Winter and the nights are long so let's have some good clean old fashioned dancing!!!

There will be "SHINDIGS AT THE BARN" Contra Dancing from 7 PM to 10 PM at the old Powder Mill Barn in Enfield, CT. Beginner's lessons from 6:30 PM to 7 PM. All are welcome to come to the event (married or single). You don't have to bring a partner. Children are welcome too. Casual dress (best no high heels, though). This venue is non-alcoholic. There is an $10 fee ($5 for students, under 12 free) the Barn charges for entry to cover their costs.

This is a great event with lots of fun and a great old fasioned abiance to boot. Dress like it is hot out for dancing as you will get hot dancing. I liked this so much I keep it as a mainstay for our group to fill the night once a month Oct. - May. Please note there is an overall limit as to how many people can fit in the Barn so I have limited RSVP's. Overall the Barn can accomodate 200 people but I think no more than about 120 could dance (attendance was around 60 in Oct. 2010). Just because you RSVP here does not necessarily mean there will be room in the Barn if you arrive late.

Location/directions to approximate meetup location at Powder Mill Barn (32 South Maple Street, Enfield, CT):
http://www.mapquest.com/maps?city=Enfield&state=CT&address=32+S+Maple+St&zipcode=06082-4653&country=US&latitude=41.98225&longitude=-72.53993&geocode=ADDRESS

Powder Mill Barn: 860-749-4494
http://www.sweetheartflute.com/Barn/
Contra Dancing information:
http://www.sweetheartflute.com/Barn/contra.html

Definition of Contra Dancing:
Fun: http://www.sbcds.org/contradance/whatis/
Dry: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Contra_dancing

Video clip of some Contra Dancing: http://www.sweetheartflute.com/Barn/ContraDance.wmv

Contra Dance Etiquette:
http://www.tcdancers.org/etiquette.html

Basic Contra Dance steps defined:
http://www.twodogwaltz.com/movesContra.pdf
http://www.tcdancers.org/aboutcontra.html
http://www.tftm.org/contradancing/Dance%20Moves.pdf

=== Legal Stuff ===

By clicking on "Yes" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows: In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.

item.name: Contra Dancing at Powder Mill Barn in Enfield CT
